articles.title: Twitter users cheer on Rizwan for being the only batsman to have crossed the 1000-run mark in a year - DAWN.com

articles.content: The T20 World Cup is over but the thrill of cricket and the Pakistan cricket team is still coursing through our veins. The team keeps finding new ways to make headlines with their spectacular work. M… [+1448 chars]
